  • Education

Study in UK from Pakistan

The United Kingdom offers you world-class education and ample professional aspects. You have a variety of programs to choose from, bachelor’s to doctorate. With the help of our education consultants in Islamabad, you not only get to study at world’s known universities but also do part-time work to support yourself. Besides, with the UK's strong economy, you have the opportunity to get a post-study work visa. Besides, the UK is one of those 5 countries that offer industry-university collaboration. It means, most of the universities have partnerships with different companies for job placements. Therefore, you get a competitive edge for job opportunities and internships.
Multicultural

The UK's diverse cultural aspects are one reason it's the best destination for students. It's multicultural and welcomes students from different regions. You get to explore high-quality living standards, a cooperative environment, and the best infrastructure while studying in the UK. Besides, it boosts your self-confidence to study in UK by making friends with students from different regions of the world.

Career Opportunities

The huge economy of the UK allows you to do post-study work. Studying in the UK gives you exposure to many full-time and part-time employment opportunities in different sizes of industries. After checking in the UK, you can easily get a part-time job to support your finances. Moreover, the post-study work visa of 2 years, is another incredible opportunity to stay there and earn in pounds.

Quality Education

Studying in the UK offers several opportunities and trains you according to the international market perspective. It is enriched with the world's leading universities and world-class education standards. The excellent teaching methods and courses make you open-minded, creative, and self-independent. Besides, you can explore different courses and fields to study in UK. The options are limitless.

Get Admission in World's Leading Universities

UK student visa requirements entail everything from your age and educational documents to your chosen courses. Our knowledgeable education consultants in Islamabad will assist you in selecting your study abroad options. We arrange different sessions to understand your requirements and opt out the best possible choices for you.

  • Educational Consultation

    Get Professional Counseling

Educational Consultation

UK student visa requirements entail everything from your age and educational documents to your chosen courses. Our knowledgeable education consultants in Islamabad will assist you in selecting your study abroad options. We arrange different sessions to understand your requirements and opt out the best possible choices for you.

Admission process

Once we know what you want, we will help you select universities and courses. The admission process might sound like a hassle, but EduCrest Hub is here to make it easy. Our best education consultants in Pakistan ensure you fill out forms and do paperwork without stress.

Visa Application Assistance

The last step is getting your visa and departure! Getting might sound like rocket science, but with EduCrest Migration, it’s seamless. Our experts help you prepare all the documents and guide you through the visa application process. Our UK visa consultants help you through the process, making it less hectic.

Our Service and Processing Includes

Our service and processing package includes a wide range of services. From study abroad counselling to admission and visa processing, we are your partner through each step. Our best education consultants in Islamabad will help you in achieving your objectives. Are you also among the ones dreaming of pursuing higher education in the UK? With its expert guidance, EduCrest Hub is here to turn your dreams into reality. Contact us and get ready to pack for the best destination of your aspirations.

  • Document Check
  • Application Process
  • Assistance With Medicals
  • Visa     Processing
  • Language Coaching

How Can We Help You Study in the UK?

EduCrest Hub, being the leading study in UK consultants, help you find the right university in the UK, grab admission, pass pre-CAS interviews, and assist you for a UK student visa. The UK usually offers 3-years of undergraduate degrees and 1-year of post-graduate degrees. Besides, our education consultants in Islamabad will help you get a hassle-free UK student visa. We offer you UK university admission assistance for different programs such as foundation, undergraduate, pre masters, Post Graduate (masters), PhD, and many others. 

Besides, we also help you with interview preparation, and even English Proficiency Tests. Are you also among the ones dreaming of pursuing higher education in the UK? With its expert guidance, EduCrest Hub is here to turn your dreams into reality. Contact us and get ready to pack for the best destination of your aspirations.

Top Universities in UK

As you embark on your educational journey, the UK stands for its academic excellence and institutions renowned for their world-class education, innovative research, and vibrant campus life.When contemplating your university choices, it’s imperative to consider not only your personal academic interests but also broader factors such as world university rankings and the associated fee structures for your desired courses. Educrest Hub is your premier ally, offering expert guidance and personalized support to realize your academic ambitions in the UK’s top-tier universities. The major universities we work with includes:

Best Universities to Study in UK with EduCrest HUB
University Global Ranking (by QS WUR) Specialty
University of Nottingham 100 Offers a wide range of courses for graduate and undergraduate programs including accountancy, aerospace engineering, management, agriculture, history, and architecture.
Queen Mary University of London 145 One of the most prestigious universities of the UK offering courses in accounting and management, law, economics, chemistry, pharmacology, engineering, and research programs.
University of Essex 459 Leading destination for Pakistani students to study in the UK. Its major study programs include accounting, producing and stage management, art history.
University of Bristol 55 Offers multiple study courses from accounting and finance, business administration, management, aerospace engineering, computer science, education, history, law, liberal arts, music, and many others.
UWE Bristol #741-740 Offers various study programs for international students in information technology, business management, architecture, financial accounting, marketing, law, and foundation courses.
University of Salford #851-900 Offers a diverse range of courses including computer science, human resources, art, law, civil engineering, design, architecture, and management.
University of Kent 336 Best university for study programs in accounting and finance, architecture, law, administration, health care, business, management, artificial intelligence, and data science.
University of Northampton #1001-1200 Offers accounting and finance, advertising and marketing, art and design, business management, computer science, engineering, e-sports and game development, law, music and arts, and more.
Edinburgh Napier University International College #801-850 Offers multiple subjects including business management, event management, IT security, accounting, business, computing, engineering, game development, marketing, and management.
Bangor University International College 481 Offers courses in computer science, law, business, social science, electronic engineering, psychology, banking and finance, accounting, management, and marketing.
University of Bradford #641-650 Offers a diverse range of subjects from cyber security, law, business administration, science, artificial intelligence, architectural engineering, accounting and finance, computer science, mechanical engineering, and animation.
University of Dundee 441 Offers subjects including anatomy, physiology, and dentistry, along with computer science, accountancy, accounting and finance, management, art, and design.
Coventry University 571 Offers courses in art, design, film, fashion, computer science, economics, business, finance and accounting, engineering, management, construction, history, and law.
University of Hull 523 Offers business management, computer science, economics, accounting, finance, data science, logistics, artificial intelligence, psychology, and engineering programs.

Why is the UK the best Destination for Study?

The best destination for Pakistani students. Explore top universities and courses in the UK, get scholarships, and apply for coming intakes. Who would deny to study in a country offering diverse culture, part-time and post graduate work opportunities, and highest quality of education. 170+ world-known universities and affordable fee structure with shorter course duration make it worth it to study in UK. Subsequently, the undergraduate degrees in the UK are of 3-years, while the postgraduate degrees are of 1 year as compared to other countries and the Pakistani education system which is 4 and 2 years respectively. Here are the tuition fees and other perks of studying in the UK:
  • • Undergraduate Tuition Fees: Approx £14,000 – £18,000 per year
  • • Postgraduate Tuition Fees: Approx £13,000 – £25,000 per year
  • • PSW Work Permit: 2 Years, for PhD and doctoral its 3 years.
  • • Visa Fee: £490
  • • Visa Type: UK Student Visa (Tier 4)

Major Intakes for UK Universities:

The major intakes for UK universities include:
  • September/October Intake: The major intakes to study in UK which offers admissions in all major universities for different programs including bachelors and masters.
  • January Intake: Some UK universities offer intake for undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

How to Apply for a UK Student Visa?

If you’re planning to study in the United Kingdom, obtaining the appropriate student visa is an essential step in your journey. The UK offers various types of student visas, and understanding the specific requirements can help ensure a smooth application process. Here’s a detailed breakdown of the key requirements for a student visa in the UK.

1. Eligibility for a UK Student Visa

 

To apply for a student visa (also known as a Tier 4 visa), you must meet certain eligibility criteria. These include:

  • • Acceptance at a recognized educational institution:
  • You must have an offer to study at a licensed Tier 4 sponsor (a university, college, or school that holds a valid sponsor license). So, contact our study with UK consultants. We will help you with the research and selection of the course at a reputable UK university. We will also submit your university application and get you the offer letter.
  • • Proof of English language proficiency: You need to demonstrate a certain level of proficiency in English, usually through standardized tests like IELTS, TOEFL, or equivalent assessments. Our experts also help you with English language proficiency test preparation. So, rest assured, you are in good hands.
  • • Financial requirements: You must show that you have sufficient funds to cover your tuition fees, living expenses, and other costs during your stay. The amount required depends on the length of your course and whether you’re studying in London or outside the capital.
  • • Required Documents: You must have a valid passport and it should have the limit of 6 months beyond your intended stay. Besides, most of the time a UK student visa also requires a tuberculosis test certificate. You need to get it from UKVI approved TB test centers in Pakistan.

2. Application Process

 

The application process for a student visa involves several key steps:

  1. 1. Obtain a Confirmation of Acceptance for Studies (CAS): Before applying for a student visa, you need to receive a CAS from your educational institution. This document confirms that you’ve been accepted into a recognized course and provides details of your enrollment.
  2. 2. Complete the Visa Application: You can apply for the student visa online through the UK government’s official website. You’ll need to fill out the application form and pay the visa fee of 490 GBP, which varies depending on your specific visa type and course length.
  3. 3. Provide Supporting Documents: Along with your application, you must submit various supporting documents. These may include:
    • • A valid passport or travel document
    • • Proof of financial support (bank statements, sponsor letters)
    • • Academic transcripts and certificates
    • • Proof of English language proficiency
    • • Academic Technology Approval Scheme (ATAS) clearance certificate (if needed)
    • • Tuberculosis test report from UKVI approved test centers
  1. 4. Attend a Visa Appointment: Depending on your nationality and the type of visa you’re applying for, you may be required to attend an appointment at a visa application center for biometrics (fingerprints and photograph).
  2. 5. Wait for a Decision: After submitting your application and attending the necessary appointments, you’ll receive a decision on your visa status. Processing times can vary, so it’s advisable to apply well in advance of your planned travel date.

3. Health and Immigration Surcharge

 

As part of your visa application, you may be required to pay the Immigration Health Surcharge (IHS). This gives you access to the UK’s National Health Service (NHS) during your stay. The IHS fee is generally included in the visa application process.

Working Rights on a UK Student Visa

UK Student visa holders are allowed to work part-time while studying, with specific restrictions:
  • • During term time: You can work up to 20 hours per week if you’re studying a degree-level course or higher.
  • • During vacation periods: Full-time work is generally allowed during scheduled breaks, such as summer or winter vacations.
Note that working conditions may vary depending on the specific type of course and your visa status.
